name: Raticate
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food.

abilities.name: Antibodies
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can’t be affected by any Special Conditions. (Remove any Special Conditions affecting this Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dirty Shock
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached to that Pokémon.
